description: Describes a pricing rule that can be associated to a pricing plan, or set of pricing plans.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A DescribePricingRuleFilter that specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARNs) of pricing rules to retrieve pricing rules information. Arns (list) --- A list containing the pricing rule Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to include in the API response. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Arns
nested_params.description: A list containing the pricing rule Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to include in the API response.

nested_items.name: BillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The billing period for which the described pricing rules are applicable.

nested_items.name: PricingRules
nested_items.description: A list containing the described pricing rules.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) used to uniquely identify a pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: The scope of pricing rule that indicates if it is globally applicable, or if it is service-specific.

nested_items.name: ModifierPercentage
nested_items.description: A percentage modifier applied on the public pricing rates.

nested_items.name: Service
nested_items.description: If the Scope attribute is SERVICE, this attribute indicates which service the PricingRule is applicable for.

nested_items.name: AssociatedPricingPlanCount
nested_items.description: The pricing plans count that this pricing rule is associated with.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pricing rule was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the pricing rule was modified.

nested_items.name: BillingEntity
nested_items.description: The seller of services provided by Amazon Web Services, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via Amazon Web Services Marketplace.

nested_items.name: Activated
nested_items.description: Activate or deactivate Amazon Web Services Free Tier application.

nested_items.name: UsageType
nested_items.description: Usage type is the unit that each service uses to measure the usage of a specific type of resource.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: Operation is the specific Amazon Web Services action covered by this line item. This describes the specific usage of the line item.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get pricing rules.
